Author: etonflesh
Text: as shit as it is that you’re going through this rn, it’s nice to know there are others out there who struggle similarly to myself, do you have any tips or tricks that help you so far? x

Author: Aleph0-4
Text: i feel the same. i'm bulimic but I was technically diagnosed as AN BP because i used to be underweight. now i'm not and i feel so stupid. there are people who are perfectly happy with no disordered thoughts who are thinner than I am so wtf am i doing  every time I binge, I think "thin people are thin because they don't binge, you fool" but I still do anyway.  it makes me feel better tho to think that after I recover, I have an entire lifetime to learn how to be thin in a way that doesn't nuke my mental health.   it's not about how hard you're trying it's the disease- you are already trying to fight your urges that non-disordered people don't even have
